title: Peaches - #3 Peach Salsa
abstract: #3 Peach Salsa (thanks Jenni - my fave recipe; a bit out there but delicious)
method: Roughly chop peaches, cucumber, 1/2 red onion, small chilli, 1 small gherkin, 1/2 avocado, parsley, mint, corriander, 1 garlic clove, juice of 1 lime and 1 teaspoon apple cider vinegar.
Pop into a bowl big enough, add juice,  a generous slurp of olive oil and season to taste.
sidebar: This goes perfectly with chicken, salmon and pork. Pretty much use whatever excess bounty you have on hand or been gifted. Wow - that’s it. Gotta love summer fruits.Share it around, substitute other fruit, enjoy. Cheers Pauline
